about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: An Egyptian Global Success Story
about.story: AZAFCO International was established in 2008 in Kafr El Sheikh Governorate, embarking on a successful journey in packaging and exporting fresh fish.
about.vision: To be the leading partner in exporting Egyptian fish worldwide
about.mission: Delivering the finest fresh fish with the highest quality and safety standards

markets_page.title: Our Markets
markets_page.subtitle: We proudly serve our clients in the most important regional markets with high-quality products
markets_page.advantages_subtitle: We offer more than just products
markets_page.cta_subtitle: Join our distinguished clients list and get the best fresh fish products
markets_page.shipping_desc: We work with the best refrigerated shipping companies to ensure fresh delivery
markets_page.partnerships_desc: We build long-term relationships with our customers as success partners
markets_page.coverage_desc: Strong distribution network covering key markets in the Gulf and Middle East

media_page.title: Media Center
media_page.stat_production: of Egypt's fish from Kafr El Sheikh

about_page.company_description: AZAFCO International Investment & Development is one of the leading companies in fresh fish packaging and export in Egypt. Founded in 2008 with a clear vision to provide the best fresh fish products to regional and international markets.
about_page.timeline_2025_upgrade: Production lines upgraded with latest technology
about_page.vision_text: To be the leading company in fresh fish export in the Middle East and North Africa region, while maintaining the highest standards of quality and environmental sustainability.
about_page.mission_text: Providing the finest fresh fish to our customers in regional and international markets, with commitment to the highest quality and food safety standards and excellent customer service.
about_page.values_subtitle: The principles we believe in and guide our work
about_page.value_trust_desc: Building long-term relationships with clients based on mutual trust
about_page.value_quality_desc: Committed to highest quality standards in all products and services
about_page.value_team_desc: Specialized team with extensive experience in fish export
about_page.value_leadership_desc: Striving to be the first choice in the Middle East region
about_page.success_story_p2: Over more than 15 years, we have built an excellent reputation in Arab markets through our commitment to quality and credibility, providing outstanding services to distributors, restaurants, and hotels.
about_page.success_story_p3: We own a modern factory equipped with the latest technologies in the industrial zone of Motobas, Kafr El Sheikh, applying the highest internationally certified quality and food safety standards.
about_page.cta_subtitle: We are here to answer all your inquiries and meet your fresh fish needs

contact_page.whatsapp_desc: Contact our inquiry team directly via WhatsApp to answer any question or get quick information about our products and services.
contact_page.whatsapp_note: Designed for general inquiries only, with fast responses to support your decision-making.
contact_page.b2b_desc: Please fill out our B2B contact form to provide us with your business details, required products, and expected quantities.
contact_page.b2b_note: The form helps us understand your needs precisely and contact you with clear steps to establish cooperation. All requests are reviewed within 24-48 hours.
contact_page.email_desc: You can send your inquiries or quote requests via email.
contact_page.email_note: This channel is suitable for detailed correspondence, file exchange, and official requests that require documentation or written follow-up. Our team will respond shortly with all required details.
contact_page.locations_subtitle: Visit us at any of our locations
contact_page.channels_subtitle: Each channel is designed to meet different needs - choose what suits your request

certificates_page.why_subtitle: Our commitment to international standards ensures you always get the best
certificates_page.click_to_view: Click on any certificate to view it in larger size
certificates_page.standards_subtitle: We apply the highest quality and safety standards in all stages of production and export
certificates_page.qa_desc: We guarantee our customers the highest internationally certified quality standards
certificates_page.gs_desc: We are committed to applying the latest global standards in the food industry
certificates_page.monitoring_desc: Constant inspection and review by certified authorities
certificates_page.ce_desc: We always strive to obtain the latest certifications and accreditations

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At AZAFCO International, we respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect and use information when you visit our website.

data_collection.title: Data We Collect
data_collection.content: We automatically collect some information when you visit our website:
data_collection.item3: Pages you visit and how you interact with them

analytics.title: Analytics Tools
analytics.content: We use trusted analytics tools to understand how visitors use our site and improve their experience:
analytics.ga4: For traffic analysis and understanding visitor behavior
analytics.clarity: For recording user interactions and improving site interface

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: Our website uses cookies to improve your browsing experience. You can disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may affect some site functionality.

sharing.title: Data Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties for marketing purposes. We may share anonymized data with analytics service providers to improve our services.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.item1: Request to know what data we hold about you
rights.item3: Opt out of any marketing communications

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, you can contact us:
